# The `CacheCost` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost">CacheCost</a></code> represents the estimated cost of a inner loop as the number of cache lines used by the memory references it contains. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::CacheCost</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost">CacheCost</a></code> represents the estimated cost of a inner loop as the number of cache lines used by the memory references it contains.

The &#39;cache cost&#39; of a loop &#39;L&#39; in a loop nest &#39;LN&#39; is computed as the sum of the cache costs of all of its reference groups when the loop is considered to be in the innermost position in the nest. A reference group represents memory references that fall into the same cache line. Each reference group is analysed with respect to the innermost loop in a loop nest. The cost of a reference is defined as follow:
<ul>
<li>one if it is loop invariant w.r.t the innermost loop,</li>
<li>equal to the loop trip count divided by the cache line times the reference stride if the reference stride is less than the cache line size (CLS), and the coefficient of this loop&#39;s index variable used in all other subscripts is zero (e.g. RefCost = TripCount/(CLS/RefStride))</li>
<li>equal to the innermost loop trip count if the reference stride is greater or equal to the cache line size CLS.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line 190 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-h">LoopCacheAnalysis.h</a>.

### CacheCost() {#a2db9458acd704df3f1edef80bcd75121}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>CacheCost::CacheCost (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a74fccdd55e3793730ca5fd831595b16d">LoopVectorTy</a> &amp; Loops, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &amp; LI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp; SE, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> &amp; TTI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaresults">AAResults</a> &amp; AA, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dependenceinfo">DependenceInfo</a> &amp; DI, std::optional&lt; unsigned &gt; TRT=std::nullopt)</>}>
Construct a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost">CacheCost</a> object for the loop nest described by <code>Loops</code>.

The optional parameter <code>TRT</code> can be used to specify the max. distance between array elements accessed in a loop so that the elements are classified to have temporal reuse.

### computeRefGroupCacheCost() {#a7d6d8ebfaadbd658fde419cd48098695}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>CacheCostTy CacheCost::computeRefGroupCacheCost (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a41a90a6262b81ec6c4f9db15111b6825">ReferenceGroupTy</a> &amp; RG, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp; L) const</>}>
Compute the cost of a representative reference in reference group <code>RG</code> when the given loop <code>L</code> is considered as the innermost loop in the nest.

The computed cost is an estimate for the number of cache lines used by the reference group. The representative reference cost is defined as:
<ul>
<li>equal to one if the reference is loop invariant, or</li>
<li>equal to &#39;(TripCount &#42; stride) / cache&#95;line&#95;size&#39; if (a) loop <code>L&#39;s</code> induction variable is used only in the reference subscript associated with loop <code>L</code>, and (b) the reference stride is less than the cache line size, or</li>
<li>TripCount otherwise</li>
</ul>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-h/#l00249">249</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-h">LoopCacheAnalysis.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-cpp/#l00730">730</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-cpp">LoopCacheAnalysis.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### populateReferenceGroups() {#a746ef146f75ef1ac0f5983517ce2742c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool CacheCost::populateReferenceGroups (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aef98c9f2de85c49568e5bdc094b97066">ReferenceGroupsTy</a> &amp; RefGroups) const</>}>
Partition store/load instructions in the loop nest into reference groups.

Two or more memory accesses belong in the same reference group if they share the same cache line.

### TRT {#ad0d700c613dbfcb1e93ea14930c848bc}

## Public Static Functions

### getCacheCost() {#aa74e490a12ab54ad9687e6844fe605f1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; CacheCost &gt; CacheCost::getCacheCost (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp; Root, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loopstandardanalysisresults">LoopStandardAnalysisResults</a> &amp; AR, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dependenceinfo">DependenceInfo</a> &amp; DI, std::optional&lt; unsigned &gt; TRT=std::nullopt)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Create a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cachecost">CacheCost</a> for the loop nest rooted by <code>Root</code>.

The optional parameter <code>TRT</code> can be used to specify the max. distance between array elements accessed in a loop so that the elements are classified to have temporal reuse.
